title: Billionaire New Zealand Brothers’ Plans to Rebuild Malibu’s Coastline Revealed After Snapping Up $65 Million in Wildfire-Damaged Plots
description: Billionaire brothers Nick and Mat Mowbray, the founders of Zuru, are reimagining the Malibu coastline with newly built homes.
content: The foreign investor secretly scooping up $65 million worth of wildfire-damaged lots along Malibu's coastline has been confirmed as the billionaire Mowbray brothers from New Zealand, Realtor.com® can… [+6824 chars]
